trans-unit.source: Discover the technical details and capabilities of Azure SQL Database, Microsoft's relational database management system (RDBMS) and PaaS solution in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Discover the technical details and capabilities of Azure SQL Database, Microsoft's relational database management system (RDBMS) and PaaS solution in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: SQL Database is a relational database service in the cloud based on the Microsoft SQL Server engine, with built-in, mission-critical capabilities.
trans-unit.target: SQL Database is a relational database service in the cloud based on the Microsoft SQL Server engine, with built-in, mission-critical capabilities.

trans-unit.source: SQL Database delivers predictable performance, scalability, business continuity, data protection, and near-zero administration to cloud developers and solution architects.
trans-unit.target: SQL Database delivers predictable performance, scalability, business continuity, data protection, and near-zero administration to cloud developers and solution architects.

trans-unit.source: Best of all, SQL Database supports existing SQL Server tools, libraries and APIs, making it easy for you to move to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Best of all, SQL Database supports existing SQL Server tools, libraries and APIs, making it easy for you to move to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: You can get a SQL Database [up and running within seconds](sql-database-get-started.md), without having to manage virtual machines or infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: You can get a SQL Database [up and running within seconds](sql-database-get-started.md), without having to manage virtual machines or infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: The programmatic DBA-like functionality enables efficient DevOps, and self-management ensures near-zero maintenance for the databases.
trans-unit.target: The programmatic DBA-like functionality enables efficient DevOps, and self-management ensures near-zero maintenance for the databases.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to focus on developing and managing your application.
trans-unit.target: This allows you to focus on developing and managing your application.

trans-unit.source: SQL Database allows you to [scale up](sql-database-service-tiers.md) single databases with no downtime and predictable performance that can be dialed up or down as needed, while you can choose [elastic databases](sql-database-elastic-pool.md) to scale out to thousands of databases within a budget that you control, leveraging the powerful manageability features of [elastic database jobs](sql-database-elastic-jobs-overview.md) and the programmatic features of [elastic database tools](sql-database-elastic-scale-get-started.md).
trans-unit.target: SQL Database allows you to [scale up](sql-database-service-tiers.md) single databases with no downtime and predictable performance that can be dialed up or down as needed, while you can choose [elastic databases](sql-database-elastic-pool.md) to scale out to thousands of databases within a budget that you control, leveraging the powerful manageability features of [elastic database jobs](sql-database-elastic-jobs-overview.md) and the programmatic features of [elastic database tools](sql-database-elastic-scale-get-started.md).

trans-unit.source: An industry leading 99.99% availability [SLA](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/sla/) helps ensure your applications face near-zero downtime.
trans-unit.target: An industry leading 99.99% availability [SLA](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/sla/) helps ensure your applications face near-zero downtime.

trans-unit.source: The built-in data protection via auditing, restore, and geo-replication helps ensure your data is protected.
trans-unit.target: The built-in data protection via auditing, restore, and geo-replication helps ensure your data is protected.

trans-unit.source: SQL Database provides you with the ability to restore your data to any point-in-time from any transaction up to 35 days.
trans-unit.target: SQL Database provides you with the ability to restore your data to any point-in-time from any transaction up to 35 days.

trans-unit.source: You can also replicate your data to an Azure region of your choice and easily implement a geographic disaster recovery policy designed for your business needs.
trans-unit.target: You can also replicate your data to an Azure region of your choice and easily implement a geographic disaster recovery policy designed for your business needs.

trans-unit.source: The [latest version of SQL Database](sql-database-preview-whats-new.md), V12, provides nearly complete compatibility with the SQL Server engine.
trans-unit.target: The [latest version of SQL Database](sql-database-preview-whats-new.md), V12, provides nearly complete compatibility with the SQL Server engine.

trans-unit.source: SQL Database is available in Basic, Standard, and Premium [service tiers](sql-database-service-tiers.md) which support light-weight to heavy-weight database workloads, so you can move across or blend the tiers together for innovative application designs.
trans-unit.target: SQL Database is available in Basic, Standard, and Premium [service tiers](sql-database-service-tiers.md) which support light-weight to heavy-weight database workloads, so you can move across or blend the tiers together for innovative application designs.

trans-unit.source: With the power and reach of Azure, you can mix-and-match Azure services with SQL Database to meet your unique modern app design needs, drive cost and resource efficiencies, and unlock new business opportunities.
trans-unit.target: With the power and reach of Azure, you can mix-and-match Azure services with SQL Database to meet your unique modern app design needs, drive cost and resource efficiencies, and unlock new business opportunities.

trans-unit.source: Get started with a [free trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/) and then [create your first SQL database](sql-database-get-started.md) in just a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: Get started with a [free trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/) and then [create your first SQL database](sql-database-get-started.md) in just a few minutes.
